gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Spurs 123, Pistons 95
gameRecap.excerpt: The Spurs defeated the Pistons, 123-95. Sandro Mamukelashvili led the way for the Spurs with 18 points (3-6 3PT FG) and eight rebounds, while Zach Collins added 17 points and nine rebounds in the victory. James Wiseman led all scorers with 21 points and 17 rebounds for the Pistons in the losing effort. The Spurs finished the regular season at 22-60, while the Pistons finished 14-68.
